name: Brisk OOC
description:
Play as Brisk an Out Of Control robot as he strives to gain and lose control with the effort of find his way out of each room.

How To Play:

-Use Brisk's limited set of abilities to gain as many controls as possible

-Lose your controls at terminals to activate the teleporter

-Go through the teleporter with the minimum amount of control possible to complete each stage

-Press R to restart the stage

-Press Escape to return to menu

The only Art assets that were preexisting were from https://www.1001freefonts.com/recharge.font

The Sound effects were made and are from https://freesound.org/ and https://sfbgames.com/chiptone/

Music was made with: Bosca Ceoil
